attributes.action: I would like for the government to stop wasting public money on this website
attributes.additional_details: So far six successful petitions have fallen on deaf ears. Lets make this the seventh.
attributes.background: The government has not discussed any of the votes so far that meet the criteria; answering them only with current government policy. We demand either our voices are heard or this false hope be removed so more effective methods of campaigning are used.
